headline: Does SLB’s Aramco Win and Tech Expansion Change The Bull Case For SLB (SLB)?
summary: In recent weeks, Archer announced that, in collaboration with SLB, it secured an integrated plug and abandonment contract from Equinor for the Titan platform in the Gulf of America, while SLB also completed its purchase of RESMAN Energy Technology and won a five-year stimulation services contract with Aramco for Saudi Arabia’s unconventional gas fields. Together, these moves show SLB expanding both its advanced reservoir-monitoring toolkit and its presence in long-cycle, technically complex...

Together, these moves show SLB expanding both its advanced reservoir-monitoring toolkit and its presence in long-cycle, technically complex...

headline: Assessing SLB (NYSE:SLB) Valuation As Recent Share Price Momentum Accelerates
summary: Why SLB (SLB) May Be On Your Radar Today SLB (SLB) has drawn attention recently, with the stock last closing at $48.52 and showing double digit total returns over the past month and past 3 months, as well as over 1 year and 5 years. For investors watching the energy sector, the company’s current valuation metrics, recent share performance, and fundamentals such as revenue of $35.247b and net income of $3.645b may prompt a closer look at whether the recent move aligns with their portfolio...
